members.name: dragRegion
members.doc: Represents the region currently dragged out by the user. This is used to figure out which dataview nodes are in the selected area and to set the size of the Proxy element used to highlight the current drag area
members.short_doc: Represents the region currently dragged out by the user. ...

members.name: tracker
members.doc: The DragTracker attached to this instance. Note that the 4 on* functions are called in the scope of the DragTracker ('this' refers to the DragTracker inside those functions), so we pass a reference to the DragSelector so that we can call this class's functions.
members.short_doc: The DragTracker attached to this instance. ...

members.name: cancelClick
members.doc: Reusable handler that's used to cancel the container click event when dragging on the dataview. See onStart for details
members.short_doc:
Reusable handler that's used to cancel the container click event when dragging on the
dataview. ...

members.name: fillRegions
members.doc: Gets the region taken up by each rendered node in the DataView. We use these regions to figure out which nodes to select based on the selector region the user has dragged out
members.short_doc: Gets the region taken up by each rendered node in the DataView. ...

members.name: getProxy
members.doc: Creates a Proxy element that will be used to highlight the drag selection region
members.short_doc: Creates a Proxy element that will be used to highlight the drag selection region ...

members.name: init
members.doc: Initializes the plugin by setting up the drag tracker
members.short_doc: Initializes the plugin by setting up the drag tracker ...

members.name: onBeforeStart
members.doc: Listener attached to the DragTracker's onBeforeStart event. Returns false if the drag didn't start within the DataView's el
members.short_doc: Listener attached to the DragTracker's onBeforeStart event. ...

members.name: onDrag
members.doc: Listener attached to the DragTracker's onDrag event. Figures out how large the drag selection area should be and updates the proxy element's size to match. Then iterates over all of the rendered items and marks them selected if the drag region touches them
members.short_doc: Listener attached to the DragTracker's onDrag event. ...

members.name: onEnd
members.doc: Listener attached to the DragTracker's onEnd event. This is a delayed function which executes 1 millisecond after it has been called. This is because the dragging flag must remain active to cancel the containerclick event which the mouseup event will trigger.
members.short_doc: Listener attached to the DragTracker's onEnd event. ...

members.name: onRender
members.doc: Called when the attached DataView is rendered. This sets up the DragTracker instance that will be used to created a dragged selection area
members.short_doc: Called when the attached DataView is rendered. ...

members.name: onStart
members.doc: Listener attached to the DragTracker's onStart event. Cancel's the DataView's containerclick event from firing and sets the start co-ordinates of the Proxy element. Clears any existing DataView selection
members.short_doc: Listener attached to the DragTracker's onStart event. ...
